CustomField.formula: IF( AND(TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c)!='Expired',TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c)!='Closed(not won)'), IF(Roll_Up_Of_Proposal_Line_Item__c >0, IF(Quote_Type__c = 'Direct CPQ' && ( ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c ,'Nokia Software')),HYPERLINK('/apex/XauthorIntermediatePage?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=LoA file &mode=touchless&outputType=NONE', IMAGE("/resource/CSP_Export","CSP Export"),"_self"),null),null),null)
CustomField.label: LoA file
